definition[0]: extremely big, and much bigger than other things of the same type
definition[1]: an extremely tall strong man, who is often bad and cruel, in children’s stories
definition[3]: a very big man, animal, or plant
definition[4]: someone who is very good at doing something
example[3]: Miles Davis, truly one of the giants of jazz
example[4]: The world’s soft drinks market is dominated by the US giants, Pepsi and Coke.
example[5]: ICI, the chemicals giant, paid $193 million to buy an American explosives manufacturer.
example[6]: giant organisations like IBM and Shell
